eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf

Interface HCPElement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HCPAbstractText, HCPAligned, HCPArea, HCPBorderContainer, HCPEmpty, HCPEmptyBorder, HCPGridContainer, HCPLineBorder, HCPMultilineText, HCPNormalText, HCPSideText, HCPSized, HCPStack

    public interface HCPElement
    General purpose element which has a size and can paint itself onto a page.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getHeight()
      Returns the height of this element.
      float getWidth()
      Returns the width of this element.
      void paint(PDPageContentStream content, PDRectangle shape)
      Paints this element to the specified PDPageContentStream.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        float getWidth()
        throws IOException
        Returns the width of this element.

        In general, this should be the minimal / optimal / preferred width of this element.

        Returns:
        the width of this element
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

      • getHeight

        float getHeight()
         throws IOException
        Returns the height of this element.

        In general, this should be the minimal / optimal / preferred height of this element.

        Returns:
        the height of this element
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

      • paint

        void paint(PDPageContentStream content,
           PDRectangle shape)
    throws IOException
        Paints this element to the specified PDPageContentStream.

        Shape defines the position and size which should be used for painting. If the size is less than specified by getWidth() and getHeight() then this method does not guarantee that (a) the requested size is used or (b) the element is painted correctly or (c) the element is painted at all.

        Parameters:
        content - not null
        shape - not null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if content or shape is null
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the stream
